home.title: front-end engineer | committed to React & Minecraft develop

home-profile.learnAbstract: graduated from NUIST 2023, MCM Meritorious Winner
home-profile.abstract: A technical worker who likes to learn new technologies, explore implementation principles, and has a strong interest in visualization. Master image processing technologies such as PS, AI, PR, and have certain aesthetic and graphic design abilities. A Minecraft developer (hobby), mainly focusing on Bedrock Edition. Insist on fitness and like the countryside.
home-profile.directionAbstract: my professional and interest development direction
home-profile.javaContent: I have read some source code of standard packages, JUC, and Spring before, but I switched to front-end due to my interest.
home-profile.jsContent: The main languages ​​used for front-end development include TypeScript, React, NextJS, and MaterialUI frameworks. They are also used for the development of the international version of Minecraft.
home-profile.otherContent:
Python: Script Tool, Minecraft Netease Development
Latex: Document writing, typesetting, drawing
home-profile.softwareAbstract: The software I would use and the level of proficiency
home-profile.vscodeLabel: the best text editor in the world
home-profile.characterAbstract: my character is very straight, don't like beating around the bush, don't the whole useless, unless you are the boss. do things more cautious, generally consider the worst case.
home-profile.liveAbstract: Don't smoke, drink, leisure time like to play games, or go out to climb a mountain, play a ball game. Like farming, the elderly life ahead of time. insist on fitness, along with the gender, only wear vest shorts in summer, winter wear only two sets of clothes.
home-profile.workingAbstract: I like to code and forget about time when I am engaged. I like to refactor projects when I have nothing to do. I pay great attention to appearance and like to explore new technologies. No one would think that coding is not fun.
home-profile.gameAbstract: like Minecraft best, from survival to building to the terrain to the development. like challenging game: 'Age Of Empires 4', 'Total War', 'Battlefield', 'Rimworld'...
home-profile.dreamAbstract: buy a cottage in second-tier city, farming、chatting with friends、enjoying the sun. dislike cars, motion sickness! buy a convertible car in the future

home-experience.trackSubtitle: click on the word to switch map location
home-experience.homeContent: born in an ordinary rural family, went to the kindergarten here
home-experience.collageContent: studied at the School of Software, Department of Software Engineering
home-experience.collage-nuist: Nanjing University of Information Science and Technology
home-experience.workingContent: the front-end engineer, start the work career
home-experience.collageAbstract: During college, I learned a lot of interesting technologies (PS, PR, Blender); I also took professional courses, focusing on front-end and back-end development, and joined several Huawei and ZTE pilot projects in the research group; I still like playing Minecraft, and became a developer, with a small income; I signed up for several competitions out of interest and got good results. In my junior year, I gave up the postgraduate entrance examination and prepared to become a worker who makes a living by technology.

home-technology.technologyAbstract: The learning paths and technology stacks of the programming languages and related ecosystems I use are shown here. Use color to indicate mastery; Shapes represent technology types (square corners represent languages, major technologies such as frameworks, rounded corners represent components, secondary technologies such as libraries, etc.).
home-technology.xAbstract: I used it before, but I don't use it much now
home-technology.xxAbstract: Can use, do not understand the principle, have not learned systematically
home-technology.xxxAbstract: Systematically studied, inexperienced, did not understand the principle
home-technology.xxxxAbstract: Systematically studied, very proficient, understand most of the principles
home-technology.xxxxxAbstract: Rich experience in use and thorough mastery of principles
home-technology.xxxxxxAbstract: Prepare to learn, use the next projects

article.title: Articles and Notebooks
article.abstract-1: All articles presented here are open sourced in the Github repository. Most of the articles are written in Latex(zh).
article.abstract-2: If you have the convenience of compiling Latex files, you can clone the repository of individual notes to get the latest articles. Even if you don't know Latex, I have stable pdf notes here as well as in the repository.
article.abstract-3: Thanks to Latex technology and TikZ Graphics Pack, my PDF notes do not exceed 10KB per page, or even smaller if there are fewer images.
article.update-content: call Github API for real-time access to the latest data warehouse
article.preview-content: use the react - PDF enclosed PDF reader, web page preview function
article.category-content: According to the type of article.
article.copyright-content: List the main references of the article, respecting the original.
article.frontAbstract: Front-end learning notes for the JavaScript ecosystem, including basic HTML5, CSS3, ES6+; React framework, check out the related blog for more in-depth content.
article.backAbstract: Back-end study notes for the Java ecosystem, including basic Java, JUC; Spring Framework, check out the blog for more in-depth content.
article.sqlAbstract: Database technology, relational databases, no-sql and related components
article.csAbstract: Computer Science and Software Engineering, Project Refactoring, Design Models and other project experience articles
article.langAbstract: programming language learning articles and related frameworks/libraries

project.abstract: Here are my or my programming projects as a key personnel to attend

project.minecraftAbstract: The Minecraft Project, the international version is developed using Microsoft's @minecraft/server, the NetEase version is developed using the Python SDK, and the Java version is developed using the frabic framework
